name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Take Down
description: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user a little.
battleEffect: Hurts the user a little.

name: Double_Edge
description: A reckless, life_risking tackle. It also damages the user quite a lot.
battleEffect: Damages the user quite a lot.

name: Safeguard
description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.
battleEffect: None status change for x seconsd.

name: Harder
description: The user focuses its energy and hardens its body, sharply raising its Defense and Special Defense stats.

name: Tail Whip
description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
battleEffect: Lowers opponent's Defense.

name: Protect
description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
battleEffect: Evades all attacks for this turn.

name: Block
description: The user takes a defensive stance and reduces the damage received by x%.

name: Growl
description: The user growls in a cute way, making the target less wary. The target's Attack stat is lowered.
battleEffect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

name: Growth
description: The user's body grows, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
battleEffect: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by one stage.

name: Wrap
description: A long body or tentacles are used to bind the target. The target is unable to use moves if its Trapped status is true.
battleEffect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4_5 turns.

name: Energy Shield
description: The user creates a shield made of energy that has a chance to prevent the move from consuming energy.

bonuses.name: Energy Shield
bonuses.bonus: Has a chance to prevent the move from consuming energy

name: Protective Shield
description: The user creates a protective shield that reduces damage taken from the opponent's next move. There is a 20% chance that this move will not use energy after use.

bonuses.name: Protective Shield
bonuses.bonus: Reduces damage taken from the opponent's next move

name: Endeavor
description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

name: Attract
description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
battleEffect: Infatuates the target if it is the opposite gender.

name: Body Slam
description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
battleEffect: May cause paralysis.

name: Camouflage
description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.
battleEffect: Changes the user's type based on the battlefield.

name: Comet Punch
description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.
battleEffect: Hits 2_5 times in one turn.

name: Copycat
description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
battleEffect: Uses the last move used by the foe(s).

name: Fury Attack
description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.
battleEffect: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

name: Crush Claw
description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
battleEffect: May lower the foe(s) Defense by one stage.

name: Crush Grip
description: The user crushes the target with a powerful grip. The more HP the target has, the greater the move's power.
battleEffect: The more HP the foe(s) has, the greater this move's power.

name: Defense Curl
description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
battleEffect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

name: Disable
description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
battleEffect: Prevents the foe(s) from using the move it last used for four turns.

name: Dizzy Punch
description: The user throws a punch that may cause confusion.
battleEffect: May confuse the target.

name: Safeguard
description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.
battleEffect: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Double Team
description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
battleEffect: Raises the user's evasiveness by one stage.

name: Encore
description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.
battleEffect: Forces the target to keep using the last move it used for three turns.

name: Endure
description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
battleEffect: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Explosion
description: The user explodes, causing massive damage to everything around it. The user faints upon using this move.
battleEffect: Deals massive damage to all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Extreme Speed
description: The user charges the target at blinding speed, hitting first and making the target flinch.
battleEffect: Always goes first. The user charges the target at blinding speed, hitting first and making the target flinch.

name: Flash
description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate dark caves.
battleEffect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

name: Focus Energy
description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical_hit ratio of its moves.
battleEffect: Raises the user's critical_hit ratio by two stages.

name: Fury Swipes
description: The user slashes the target with sharp claws. This attack hits the target 2_5 times in a row.
battleEffect: Hits 2_5 times in one turn.

name: Giga Impact
description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
battleEffect: User cannot attack next turn.

name: Headbutt
description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: May cause flinching.

bonuses.name: Sheer Force
bonuses.bonus: Increases Damage of All Moves with Additional Effects by 30%

name: Horn Attack
description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target.

name: Hyper Beam
description: The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
battleEffect: Charges on the first turn, then hits the target on the second turn. May also paralyze the target.

name: Hyper Fang
description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target. May also make the target flinch.

name: Last Resort
description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.
battleEffect: Can only be used after all other moves are used.

name: Leer
description: The user gives a menacing look that lowers the target's Defense stat.
battleEffect: Lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Lock_On
description: The user takes sure aim at the target, ensuring that the next attack will hit.
battleEffect: Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target.

name: Mean Look
description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.
battleEffect: Prevents the target from fleeing.

name: Mega Kick
description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle_packed power.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target.

name: Mega Punch
description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle_packed power.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target.

name: Mind Reader
description: The user predicts the target's next move and ensures the next attack will hit.
battleEffect: Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target.

name: Pound
description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target.

name: Protect
description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
battleEffect: The user is protected from all attacks. Raises the chance of failure if used in succession.

name: Quick Attack
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target. This move has a priority of +1.

name: Rapid Spin
description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target. Also eliminates the effects of the moves Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes from the user's team.

name: Razor Wind
description: A two_turn attack that cuts the target using sharp blades of wind. The user can't move on the next turn.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second.

name: Recover
description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
battleEffect: Restores the user's HP by 50% of its max HP.

name: Roar
description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
battleEffect: Forces the target to switch out. In wild battles, ends the battle against a wild Pokémon.

name: Safeguard
description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.
battleEffect: Creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Scary Face
description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to sharply reduce its speed stat.
battleEffect: Reduces the target's speed stat sharply.

name: Scratch
description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
battleEffect: Deals damage to the target.

name: Self_Destruct
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
battleEffect: Deals massive damage to all surrounding targets. User faints.

name: Shell Smash
description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its defenses and increasing its Attack, Sp. Attack, and Speed stats.
battleEffect: Increases Attack, Sp. Attack, and Speed stats. Decreases Defense and Sp. Defense stats.

name: Sing
description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.
battleEffect: Puts the target to sleep.

name: Screech
description: An ear_splitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.
battleEffect: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

name: Skull Bash
description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
battleEffect: Raises Defense on first turn, then attacks on second turn.

name: Slam
description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. This may also cause the target to flinch.
battleEffect: May also cause target to flinch.

name: Slash
description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
battleEffect: High critical hit ratio.

name: Smokescreen
description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.
battleEffect: Lowers target's accuracy.

name: Super Fang
description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.
battleEffect: Always cuts target's HP in half.

name: Supersonic
description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. This confuses the target.
battleEffect: Confuses target.

name: Sweet Scent
description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.
battleEffect: Lowers target's evasion.

name: Swords Dance
description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.
battleEffect: Raises user's Attack by two stages.

name: Thrash
description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
battleEffect: Attacks for 2_3 turns, then confuses the user.

name: Tri Attack
description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three_beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
battleEffect: May paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.

name: Max Strike
description: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
battleEffect: Charges the target with electricity and may leave it paralyzed.

name: Rage
description: The user becomes enraged, raising its Attack stat each time it is hit in battle.

name: Vine Whip
description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

name: Ingrain
description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. It can't switch out or escape.

name: Stun Spore
description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

name: Power Whip
description: The user violently strikes the target with a thick, whiplike vine. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Pollen Shroud
description: The user sends out a cloud of pollen that makes it difficult for the opponent to see, increasing the user's dodge chance by x%.

bonuses.name: Pollen Shroud
bonuses.bonus: Increases user's dodge chance by x%

name: Sleep Powder
description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep_inducing dust around the target.
battleEffect: Puts the target to sleep.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Sharp_edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.
battleEffect: Increased critical hit rate.

name: Bullet Seed
description: The user rapidly shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.
battleEffect: Fires 2_5 seeds at the target.

name: Leech Seed
description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
battleEffect: Saps HP from the target every turn.

name: Seed Bomb
description: A seed is dropped on the target. It inflicts damage with an explosive blast.
battleEffect: An explosive blast damages the target.

name: Frenzy Plant
description: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.
battleEffect: User cannot move next turn.

name: Giga Drain
description: A nutrient_draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
battleEffect: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Grass Knot
description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.
battleEffect: Power varies based on target's weight.

name: Absorb
description: A nutrient_draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
battleEffect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on target.

name: Energy Ball
description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def.
battleEffect: May lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: Leaf Blade
description: The user slashes the target with a blade formed by its leaves. Critical hits land more easily.
battleEffect: High critical hit ratio.

name: Leaf Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
battleEffect: Sharply lowers user's Special Attack.

name: Magical Leaf
description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.
battleEffect: Never misses.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.
battleEffect: Hits adjacent Pokémon.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user attacks for 2_3 turns and then becomes confused.
battleEffect: User becomes uncontrollable for a few turns.

name: Solar Beam
description: A two_turn attack. The user absorbs sunlight on the first turn and releases it as a powerful beam on the second turn.

bonuses.name: Chlorophyll
bonuses.bonus: 2% Energy Regen per Level in Sunlight

name: Solar Blade
description: In this two_turn attack, the user gathers light and energy, then slashes the target on the next turn.

bonuses.name: Chlorophyll
bonuses.bonus: 2% Energy Regen per Level in Sunlight

name: Supernova
description: The user creates a huge cosmic explosion that devastates everything around, possibly causing burns. However, the user falls asleep after using this move.
battleEffect: Creates a huge cosmic explosion that devastates everything around, possibly causing burns. User falls asleep.

name: Blast Burn
description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn.

bonuses.name: Flash Fire
bonuses.bonus: 1.5x Damage Boost if hit by Fire_type Move this turn

name: Ember
description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

bonuses.name: Flash Fire
bonuses.bonus: 1.5x Damage Boost if hit by Fire_type Move this turn

name: Fire Blast
description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all_consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
battleEffect: May leave the target with a burn.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Fire Fang
description: The user bites with flame_cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.
battleEffect: May cause flinching or burning.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Fire Punch
description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
battleEffect: May leave the target with a burn.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Fire Claws
description: The user attacks with fiery claws, inflicting both physical and burn damage. This move has a high critical hit ratio.
battleEffect: Has a high critical hit ratio and may inflict burn damage.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Fire Spin
description: The target is trapped in a ring of fire. This will cause the target to take damage over several turns.
battleEffect: Traps the target and causes damage over several turns.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Heat Wave
description: The user exhales a heated breath to attack. This may also inflict a burn.
battleEffect: May cause a burn.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Lava Plume
description: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all opposing Pokémon. This may also inflict burns.
battleEffect: May cause burns.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Inferno
description: The user creates a blazing inferno to engulf the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
battleEffect: May cause a burn.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Overheat
description: The user blasts the target with high heat. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.
battleEffect: Lowers user's Sp. Atk after use.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Sunny Day
description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire_type moves and weakening Water_type moves.

bonuses.name: Drought
bonuses.bonus: User's Fire_type moves deal 50% more damage while active

name: Flamethrower
description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
battleEffect: May cause a burn.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Flare Blitz
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.
battleEffect: May cause the opponent to become burned.

bonuses.name: Flame Body
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Burn Attacker on Contact

name: Igneous Defense
description: This Pokémon resists a attack taking x% less damage. If the incoming move is a Rock_type move, the damage reduction is increased.

bonuses.name: Rock Resilience
bonuses.bonus: x% Damage Resistance to Rock Type Moves

name: Geysers
description: A natural hot spring that intermittently spews water and steam into the air, burning targets.
battleEffect: The user spews a stream of boiling water and steam into the air, burning all targets.

name: Scald
description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
battleEffect: May burn target.

name: Solar Flares
description: The user redirects the force of the sun to unleash a burst of intense flames that burn all opponents in the arena.
battleEffect: Burns all opponents in the arena.

name: Flame Wing
description: The user cloaks its wings in flames and rams into the target. Has a chance to burn the target.
battleEffect: Has a chance to burn the target.

name: Tidequake
description: The user creates a massive earthquake, causing a destructive tidal wave to crash over the enemy. This move deals double damage if used in water or during rainfall.
battleEffect: Causes a massive tidal wave to crash over the enemy, dealing heavy damage. Double damage if used in water or during rainfall.

bonuses.name: Tidal Surge
bonuses.bonus: Double damage if used in water or during rainfall.

name: Tsunamis
description: The user generates massive waves using its psychic abilities that hit all opponents in the arena.
battleEffect: Generates massive waves that hit all opponents in the arena.

name: Water Gun
description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Bubble
description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stats.
battleEffect: May lower opponent's Speed.

name: Bubble Beam
description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. This may also lower their Speed stats.
battleEffect: May lower opposing team's Speed stat.

name: Liquidation
description: The user slams into the target using a full_force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
battleEffect: May lower target's Defense stat.

name: Dive
description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second turn.
battleEffect: Dives on first turn, attacks on second turn.

name: Razor Shell
description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
battleEffect: May lower target's Defense.

name: Frost Wave
description: The user creates a wave of icy water that deals damage and has a chance to freeze the target.
battleEffect: Has a chance to freeze the target.

name: Water Pulse
description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.
battleEffect: May cause confusion.

name: Rain Dance
description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water_type moves.

name: Bubble Defense
description: The user creates a giant bubble to defend against attacks. It reduces damage, and even more so if the attack is Water or Ice type.
battleEffect: Creates a bubble to reduce damage from attacks.

name: Withdraw
description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.
battleEffect: Raises Defense.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
battleEffect: An intense water attack that may lower the target's accuracy.

name: Hydro Cannon
description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.
battleEffect: An ultra_powerful water attack. The user must rest on the next turn.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
battleEffect: User attacks first.

name: Aqua Ring
description: The user surrounds itself with a veil of water, allowing it to restore a little HP each turn.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
battleEffect: May cause flinching.

bonuses.name: Mega Launcher
bonuses.bonus: 50% Boost to Pulse and Ball moves

name: Icebergs
description: The Pokemon creates a large block of ice that hits enemies, dealing massive physical damage. This move is most effective when performed in water or during rainfall, and has a chance to freeze the target.
battleEffect: The Pokemon creates a large block of ice that hits enemies, dealing massive physical damage. This move is most effective when performed in water or during rainfall, and has a chance to freeze the target.

name: Rainbows
description: The Pokemon creates a beautiful rainbow, which enhances its special defense and special attack.
battleEffect: The Pokemon creates a beautiful rainbow, which enhances its special defense and special attack.

name: Poison Ivy
description: The user releases a toxic cloud of spores that can poison or paralyze the enemy.
battleEffect: May poison or paralyze the target.

name: Poison Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
battleEffect: Poisons the target.

bonuses.name: Poison Touch
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance of Poisoning the Target on Contact

bonuses.name: Toxic Boost
bonuses.bonus: 10% Damage Boost per Turn After Being Poisoned

name: Sludge
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
battleEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

bonuses.name: Poison Touch
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance of Poisoning the Target on Contact

bonuses.name: Toxic Boost
bonuses.bonus: 10% Damage Boost per Turn After Being Poisoned

name: Sludge Bomb
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
battleEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

bonuses.name: Poison Touch
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance of Poisoning the Target on Contact

bonuses.name: Toxic Boost
bonuses.bonus: 10% Damage Boost per Turn After Being Poisoned

name: Toxic Shield
description: The user creates a toxic gas shield that reduces damage taken and has a chance to poison attackers.

bonuses.name: Toxic Shield
bonuses.bonus: Reduces damage taken and has a chance to poison attackers.

name: Electroweb
description: The user captures and attacks opposing Pokemon by using an electric net. It reduces the targets' Speed stat.

bonuses.name: Surge Surfer
bonuses.bonus: Double Speed Boost in Electric Terrain

name: Raging Storm
description: The opponent is caught in a raging storm, where they are trapped, unable to move properly and unable to switch Pokémon. Random rays fall from the sky and can hit the enemy, causing paralysis. The attack's effect lasts for a set duration, and each thunderbolt has a chance to hit every X seconds.
battleEffect: Traps the opponent in a raging storm, unable to move or switch Pokémon. Random rays fall from the sky, causing paralysis. The effect lasts for a set duration, and each thunderbolt has a chance to hit every X seconds.

name: Thunder Storm
description: The user unleashes a powerful thunderstorm that strikes all opponents. This move has a high critical_hit ratio.
battleEffect: Strikes all opponents. High critical_hit ratio.

name: Fly
description: The user flies up into the sky and then dives at a steep angle to strike the target.

name: Gust
description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

name: Whirlwind
description: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

name: Tailwind
description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

name: Air Slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slashes fiercely at the target. It may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: May cause the opponent to flinch.

name: Dust Devils
description: The user creates a small whirlwind of dust and debris that surrounds them, increasing their dodge chance by x%.

bonuses.name: Dust Devils
bonuses.bonus: Increases user's dodge chance by x%

name: Airborne Dodge
description: The user quickly flies up into the sky, dodging the opponent's attack. The chance of dodging is increased if the user is on the Fly or has the Fly ability selected.

bonuses.name: Aerial Ace
bonuses.bonus: 20% Boost to Dodging Attacks while on Fly or with Fly ability selected

name: Dragon's Gale
description: The user vigorously flaps its wings, creating a devastating shockwave that hits all enemy pokemons with massive special damage.
battleEffect: Hits all enemy pokemons with a fierce gale of wind and energy.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws. It may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: May cause the opponent to flinch.

name: Dragon Breath
description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
battleEffect: May cause paralysis.

name: Fatal Protection
description: The user takes a defensive stance that blocks all incoming damage. However, this harshly lowers the user's defense and sp. defense.

bonuses.name: Risky Block
bonuses.bonus: Blocks all incoming damage but harshly lowers the user's defense and sp. defense.

name: Risk_Block
description: The user takes a high_risk, high_reward defensive stance. There is a chance to block all damage received, but if successful, the user's defense and sp. defense are harshly lowered.

bonuses.name: Risk_Block
bonuses.bonus: Has a chance to block all damage received and raise the user's Defense and Special Defense.

name: Iron Defense
description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
battleEffect: Blasts the foe with a huge volume of light. May also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: Rockslide Quake
description: The user causes a massive rockslide, causing damage to all opponents and lowering their accuracy.
battleEffect: Lowers opponents' accuracy.

name: Sinkholes
description: The user creates multiple sinkholes on the battlefield, causing massive area damage to all enemy Pokemon.

name: Eruption
description: The user triggers a massive eruption from the ground, causing devastating Fire and Ground damage to all opponents and the user.
battleEffect: Causes massive Fire and Ground damage to all opponents and the user.

name: Cataclysm
description: The user unleashes a devastating nature effect that hits all Pokemon in the arena, including the user. The second type of the move varies based on the weather conditions.
battleEffect: Unleashes a devastating nature effect that hits all Pokemon in the arena, including the user.

name: Aurora Borealis
description: The Pokémon creates an intense light with the cold air, drastically decreasing the opponent's Special Attack.
battleEffect: The user creates an intense light with the cold air, drastically decreasing the opponent's Special Attack.

name: Lunar Eclipse
description: The user invokes a gigantic aura that covers the moon, absorbing its energy. The aura then descends with all its strength falling on the enemies. This attack leaves the user asleep after use.
battleEffect: The user invokes a gigantic aura that covers the moon, absorbing its energy. The aura then descends with all its strength falling on the enemies.

name: Solar Eclipse
description: The Pokemon invokes a gigantic aura that covers the sun, absorbing its energy, and then descends with all its strength to hit the enemies. This move deals damage to all opponents in the arena and has a chance to burn them. This attack leaves the user asleep after use.
battleEffect: The Pokemon invokes a gigantic aura that covers the sun, absorbing its energy, and then descends with all its strength to hit the enemies.

name: Gravity Waves
description: Ripples in the fabric of spacetime that propagate outward from a massive object, such as a black hole or a pair of merging neutron stars. This attack causes confusion and hits all Pokémon in the arena.
battleEffect: Creates ripples in the fabric of spacetime, causing confusion and hitting all Pokémon in the arena.

name: Glaciers
description: The user summons masses of ice that form over many years in areas where snowfall exceeds melting ice and hurls them at opponents.
battleEffect: The user summons masses of ice that form over many years in areas where snowfall exceeds melting ice and hurls them at opponents.

bonuses.name: Frozen Solid
bonuses.bonus: Has a 20% chance to freeze the target.

name: Confusion
description: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also confuse the target.
battleEffect: An attack that may cause confusion.

name: Psybeam
description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.
battleEffect: The foe is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

name: Silver Wind
description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.
battleEffect: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: String Shot
description: The opposing Pokemon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

name: Bug Buzz
description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
battleEffect: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Rage Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. This reduces the target's accuracy.
battleEffect: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. This reduces the target's accuracy.

name: Quiver Dance
description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
battleEffect: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Struggle Bug
description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
battleEffect: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name: Twineedle
description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
battleEffect: The user jabs the target with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

name: Poison Sting
description: The user stabs the target with a toxic barb, potentially poisoning it.
battleEffect: A sharp jolt of poison_tipped barbs are shot at the target. It may also poison the target.

name: Venoshock
description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
battleEffect: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Pin Missile
description: Sharp pins are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
battleEffect: Sharp pins are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: Poison Jab
description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
battleEffect: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: Fell Stinger
description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.
battleEffect: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.

name: Fury Cutter
description: A slashing attack that grows in power with each consecutive hit.

name: Drill Run
description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.
battleEffect: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Agility
description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.
battleEffect: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

name: Pursuit
description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.
battleEffect: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

name: Assurance
description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.
battleEffect: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

name: Bite
description: The user bites with cold_infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: May cause flinching.
